name: lz
content: <WAREHOUSE LOCATION="<tkBookmark collection="perf" name="wpa"/>"/>	<HISTORY TABLE="KLZ_CPU" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A"  />    	<HISTORY TABLE="KLZ_Disk" Interval="5" RETAIN="24"   EXPORT="5" USE="A" />	<HISTORY TABLE="KLZ_Disk_IO" Interval="5" RETAIN="24"  EXPORT="5" USE="A"  />	<HISTORY TABLE="KLZ_IO_Ext" Interval="5" RETAIN="24"  EXPORT="5" USE="A" />	<HISTORY TABLE="KLZ_Network" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />	<HISTORY TABLE="KLZ_System_Statistics" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />	<HISTORY TABLE="KLZ_VM_Stats" Interval="5" RETAIN="24" EXPORT="5" USE="A" />
